EmailTemplate.description: Internal Notification of AVSAT Sales order Creation (Internal)
EmailTemplate.name: AVSAT Sales Order Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: AVSAT Sales Order Notification (Internal) {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team, SALES ORDER OUTPUT
PROJECT NAME:
AVSAT
CUSTOMER NAME:
PROJECT #/
SALES ORDER#
BUSINESS UNIT:
AVSAT
PROGRAM MANAGER:
CONTRACT ADMINISTRATOR
CONTRACT NO::
CONTRACT VALUE(s):
PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE
MATERIAL NUMBER
QTY/CUSTOMER ON DOCK DATE
ADDITIONAL COMMENTS:
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
